page.title: 04LIFE STYLES-1
page.content: We talked to Mrs Drayton. She owns a small hotel in{SANDOWN.} She said during the Spring for about twelve weeks she has lots of{SCHOOL PARTIES. They come from sll parts of the country but mostly from London. After breakfast they go out by coach all day to visit places like Robin Hill, Carisbrooke Castle and Blackgang Chine. After tea they use the dining room as a classroom to do some work. Mr Drayton does the cooking. He did 44 poached eggs last night. They have a disco each week. Their season goes from March to October. Sometimes they take old people in Winter who have come out of hospital and are not allowed to go home on their own. There are 120 hotels in this part of the island. Mrs Drayton does all the organising.
